title: Bengals Draft Best Case/Worst Case, Ray Lewis on OBJ, Pats Drama
description:
John Breech joins Will Brinson in John's last show before his wedding (!) to break down Ray Lewis' kooky comments on Odell Beckham Jr, Andrew Luck not having touched a football yet, the drama surrounding the Patriots, whether he would prefer Johnny Manziel or Tim Tebow if he was starting a team and what the best case scenario for the Bengals draft is along with the worst case scenario for the Bengals draft.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
